attributes.action: Consider that our home is are castle we will not open are doors to snoops
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Today we live in a big brother society, law-bidding citizens are treated like criminals,now databases are setup so that all citizens including children will be traced as a criminal.

Our identies will be liable to be lost or stolen. Yet we are expected to invite even more snoopers into our homes, no thank you.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
